text: إِنَّمَآ أَمْوَٰلُكُمْ وَأَوْلَـٰدُكُمْ فِتْنَةٌ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ عِندَهُۥٓ أَجْرٌ عَظِيمٌ

translation.en.sahih: Your wealth and your children are but a trial, and Allah has with Him a great reward.
translation.id.indonesian: Sesungguhnya hartamu dan anak-anakmu hanyalah cobaan (bagimu), dan di sisi Allah-lah pahala yang besar.
